fields.name: Breaking Free
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 1*
> When Shinobu’s HP is not higher than 50%, her Healing Bonus is increased by 15%

fields.name: Heart's Repose
fields.value:
*Unlocked at Ascension 4*
> Sanctifying Ring's abilities will be boosted based on her Elemental Mastery:

> Healing amount will be increased by 75% of Elemental Mastery
> Damage dealt is increased by 25% of Elemental Mastery

fields.name: Talent for Daily Life
fields.value:
*Unlocked Automatically*
> Gains 25% more rewards when dispatched on an Inazuma Expedition for 20 hours
